DOC.criteria: Parents : age 18+ year , custodial guardian child , speak/read/understand English Children : age 35 year , live full time custodial guardian 's home Community health worker : age 18+ year , currently employ partner health department , able speak/read/understand English Parents : already access behavioral health service child , report suicidal ideation intent harm self others , participate formative research study Children : diagnose severe developmental condition ( i.e. , significant developmental delay , autism , debilitate neurological condition ) Community health worker : none
